item.title: Trump signals more tariff letters coming Wednesday
item.description: Trump uses tariffs as a key tool to force changes to U.S. trade relationships, but his on-again-off-again approach has roiled markets and stoked uncer...

item.title: Trump's tariffs on cars, copper, drugs, aluminum could hit harder than other levies
item.description: The sector-specific tariffs are putting pressure on businesses and foreign nations as they try to navigate Trump's constantly evolving trade agenda.

item.title: Embattled Iran slams consequences of war on oil markets
item.description: War can lead to ‘complications on energy producers’ and hardships on national economies, Iran’s oil minister warned on Wednesday.

item.title: European Union in limbo as Washington keeps it waiting on a trade agreement
item.description: The transatlantic trading partners could however reach a framework deal as soon as this week.

item.title: Trump says he will impose 50% tariff on copper imports
item.description: President Donald Trump said he will impose a 50% tariff on copper imports and suggested more steep sector-specific duties are on the way.
